mapper.insert: insert into t_shopping_goods( goods_id, goods_title, goods_writer, goods_publisher, goods_price, goods_sales_price, goods_published_date, goods_total_page, goods_isbn, goods_delivery_price, goods_delivery_date, goods_file_name, goods_status, goods_intro, goods_writer_intro, goods_publisher_comment, goods_recommendation, goods_contents_order, goods_cate_main) values( #{goodsId}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsWriter}, #{goodsPublisher}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsSalesPrice}, #{goodsPublishedDate}, #{goodsTotalPage}, #{goodsIsbn}, #{goodsDeliveryPrice}, #{goodsDeliveryDate}, #{goodsFileName}, #{goodsStatus}, #{goodsIntro}, #{goodsWriterIntro}, #{goodsPublisherComment}, #{goodsRecommendation}, #{goodsContentsOrder}, #{goodsCateMain} )
insert into t_goods_detail_image(goods_id, file_Name, reg_id, file_type) values( #{goodsId}, #{fileName}, #{regId}, #{fileType} )
mapper.select: select * from ( select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as recNum, goods_id, goods_title, goods_writer, goods_publisher, goods_sales_price, date_format(goods_entered_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as goods_entered_date, date_format(goods_published_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as goods_published_date from ( select goods_id, goods_title, goods_writer, goods_publisher, goods_sales_price, goods_entered_date, goods_published_date from t_shopping_goods where date_format(goods_entered_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} order by goods_entered_date desc, goods_id desc ) as innerquery cross join (select @rowNum := 0) as dummy ) as outerquery where recNum between (#{section}-1)*100+ (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum})*10

select g.*, date_format(g.goods_published_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as goods_published_date, d.file_name from t_shopping_goods g, t_goods_detail_image d where g.goods_id=d.goods_id and d.file_type='main_image' and g.goods_id=#{goods_Id} order by g.goods_id
select * from t_goods_detail_image where goods_id=#{goods_Id} order by image_id asc
mapper.update:
update t_shopping_order
delivery_state=#{deliveryState},
delivery_address=#{deliveryAddress},
where order_id=#{orderId}
